title: Not enough ip
body: Currently I have 3153 ip. I want to buy Twitch but it says I do not have enough ip. I have no idea why but this is the first time it's happened. I tried logging out and back in and it didn't work. I have also tried restarting my pc and that didn't work either please help.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support as this is an account specific inquiry, we here on the boards are unable to assist with account related inquiries.

Glad to hear that I'm not the only one experiencing this issue right now. Been saving up for Hecarim, got 4900+ IP, and I'm being told that I don't have enough. I've restarted my client several times and it's not fixing the problem.
